sections.heading: Words "plaintiff" and "defendant" include plaintiff and defendant in an incidental actionUnless the context clearly indicates otherwise, wherever the words "plaintiff" and "defendant" are used in this Code, they respectively include a plaintiff and a defendant in an incidental demand
